timeline.message:
Add debug symbols support #9792

* Added new debug symbol enable option,
to avoid breaking existing usage.
* Used objcopy to split debug symbols from binary.

timeline.body: I'd suggest to run this `objcopy("--strip-debug", executable.toString());` also when no debug symbols are being requested.  The reason for this is that OpenJDK's static libraries might contain debug symbols which in turn might end up in the native image binary and you could get rid of them in the produced native image by stripping them via `objcopy --strip-debug`.
timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest to run this objcopy("--strip-debug", executable.toString()); also when no debug symbols are being requested.  The reason for this is that OpenJDK's static libraries might contain debug symbols which in turn might end up in the native image binary and you could get rid of them in the produced native image by stripping them via objcopy --strip-debug.

The reason for this is that OpenJDK's static libraries might contain debug symbols which in turn might end up in the native image binary and you could get rid of them in the produced native image by stripping them via objcopy --strip-debug.
timeline.author: jerboaa

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// Strip debug symbols regardless, because the the underlying JDK might contain them
// Strip debug symbols regardless, because the underlying JDK might contain them
